structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: The fiscal court, consolidated local government, or urban-county government, whichever is appropriate, shall pay the expense of conducting a search for a body where such search has been ordered by the coroner.
law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 346, sec. 75, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 93, sec. 15, effective June 17, 1978.
